grammarNote.title: Relative Clauses (continued)
grammarNote.explanation:
More noun modification. 嵐のあとのテント — the tent after the storm. 捨てたものがある — there exists a thing thrown away.

Notice these stack: 捨てたもののなかに秘密がある — inside the discarded thing, there's a secret. Each phrase builds on the last.

Also notice かもしれない appearing: 嵐が戻るかもしれない — the storm might return. This attaches to any sentence to add uncertainty.

Re-read and trace how descriptions layer onto nouns.
